displayName.english: Life teaches only those who study it!
displayName.german: Das Leben belehrt nur die,  die es studieren!
displayName.russian: Жизнь учит лишь тех,  кто ее обучает!
displayName.token: Life teaches only those who study it!

displayName.english: Adventures only happen if you go to places you shouldn't!
displayName.german: Abenteuer finden nur an Orten statt, an denen du nicht sein solltest!
displayName.russian: Приключения случаются только  если ты идешь туда, куда не следует!
displayName.token: Adventures only happen if you go to places you shouldn't!

displayName.english: The best tactic is a combination of cunning, speed, and strategy!
displayName.german: Die beste Taktik ist die Kombination aus  Cleverness, Tempo und Strategie!
displayName.russian: Идеальная тактика представляет собой сочетание хитрости, скорости и стратегии!
displayName.token: The best tactic is a combination of cunning, speed, and strategy!

displayName.english: You've become more powerful. Terrified enemies make way for you now!
displayName.german: Du bist stärker geworden. Ängstliche Feinde gehen dir aus dem Weg!
displayName.russian: Ты стал сильнее, враги в страхе раступаются перед тобой!
displayName.token: You've become more powerful. Terrified enemies make way for you now!

displayName.english: Money is freedom, and freedom is life!
displayName.german: Geld heißt Freiheit und  Freiheit heißt Leben!
displayName.russian: Деньги это свобода, а свобода - жизнь!
displayName.token: Money is freedom, and freedom is life!

displayName.english: You won't lose as long as you believe that you're going to win!
displayName.german: Du wirst nicht verlieren, solange du an deinen Erfolg glaubst!
displayName.russian: Ты не проиграешь, если будешь  верить, что победишь!
displayName.token: You won't lose as long as you believe that you're going to win!

displayName.english: Every obstacles is just an opportunity to get stronger!
displayName.german: Jedes Hindernis ist nur eine Chance, stärker zu werden!
displayName.russian: Любая преграда лишь  повод стать сильнее!
displayName.token: Every obstacles is just an opportunity to get stronger!

description.english: The world is finished with 3 stars
description.german: Die Welt wurde mit 3 Sternen  abgeschlossen
description.token: The world is finished with 3 stars

displayName.english: Courage is the exclusive property of real knights!
displayName.german: Mut ist die einzigartige Eigenschaft der Ritter!
displayName.token: Courage is the exclusive property of real knights!

description.english: Abilities of the Knight is used 15 times
description.token: Abilities of the Knight is used 15 times

displayName.english: The power of nature is great!
displayName.german: Die Kraft der Natur ist großartig!
displayName.token: The power of nature is great!

description.english: Abilities of the Wood Goblin is used 15 times
description.token: Abilities of the Wood Goblin is used 15 times

displayName.english: You are reliably protected by the stone sentinel!
displayName.german: Du wirst von der steinernen Wache beschützt!
displayName.token: You are reliably protected by the stone sentinel!

description.english: Abilities of the Golem is used 15 times
description.token: Abilities of the Golem is used 15 times

displayName.english: No matter how fast the dragon flies, it matters how fast you run!
displayName.german: Wie schnell der Drache auch fliegt, was zählt ist wie schnell du rennst!
displayName.russian: Неважно, как быстро летит дракон,  важно, как быстро бежишь ты!
displayName.token: No matter how fast the dragon flies, it matters how fast you run!

description.english: Abilities of the Dragon is used 10 times
description.token: Abilities of the Dragon is used 10 times

displayName.english: Only those who believe in magic will get boundless power over reality!
displayName.german: Nur wer an Magie glaubt, wird die grenzenlose Macht der Wirklichkeit erfahren!
displayName.russian: Лишь способные поверить в волшебство получат безграничную власть над реальностью!
displayName.token: Only those who believe in magic will get boundless power over reality!

description.english: Abilities of the Sorceress is used 10 times
description.token: Abilities of the Sorceress is used 10 times

displayName.english: The tougher the battle, the more meaningful the victory!
displayName.german: Je härter der Kampf, desto größer der Sieg!
displayName.russian: Чем сложнее борьба,  тем значительней победа!
displayName.token: The tougher the battle, the more meaningful the victory!

displayName.english: Your Majesty, if you give up without trying, the results won't change!
displayName.german: Eure Majestät, aufgeben ohne es zu versuchen ändert das Ergebnis nicht!
displayName.russian: Ваше Величество, если сдадитесь  не попробовав, результат не изменится!
displayName.token: Your Majesty, if you give up without trying, the results won't change!
